this is an invasive fish from china they
were introduced in the united states for
wastewater treatment purposes and they
escaped during a big flood on the
mississippi and they're just all over
the mississippi basin now and there's
two species there's the big head carp
and the silver carp but they're filter
feeders kind of like gizzard shad or
paddlefish they swim around and suck up
zooplankton and their meat is a lot like
crappie meat but if they've got a lot of
bones in them and i think uh miss
belinda is a little dubious about eating
one of these yeah yeah
in eastern russia china and brazil these
